page.title: 06AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE,FARM
page.content:
The site of the Agricultural College farm covers 1000 acres.The college was built in 1926 and has been running for 60 years.Before the college and college outbuildings were built there was a farm on the site. The East Sussex County Council owns the college and finances it.There are{ 54 staff and 115 residentual students the average age of the students is 18. 60% of them are local people.The college has 18 computers and 2 science laboratries. The college does not have any bus services put on,but has 3 mini-buses. {
{
